availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Hutchison Franks in Grant County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1839. Father of William A. Franks, Sarah A. Franks, John J. Franks, Vardiman P. Franks, Nancy Franks, Susan E. Franks, Martha E. Franks, Eliza L. Franks, and Daniel C. Franks. Farmer in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 106.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film #000266220.
Find A Grave, "William Franks (March 27, 1816-March 5, 1903)," Memorial #25574415, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25574415 (accessed June 14, 2018).
